settings.label: Background
settings.info: Applies to PLP and PDP product images when transparency disabled

settings.label: Heading Font
settings.info: Select a custom font or leave empty to use the font picker below.

settings.label: Body Font
settings.info: Select a custom font or leave empty to use the font picker below.

settings.label: Caption Font
settings.info: Select a custom font or leave empty to use the font picker below.
This is checked against the inventory quantity for a specific variant
settings.label: t:settings_schema.badges.settings.few_left_badge_stock_threshold.label
Enable GTM
settings.info: When enabled, GTM scripts will be included at top of site head

settings.label: Enable Klaviyo Back in Stock
settings.info: When enabled, Klaviyo BIS will be applied to al ATC instances, including main product and quick add.

settings.label: Klaviyo Store Code
settings.info: Define Klaviyo Store code (6 character code)

settings.label: Klaviyo Newsletter Code
settings.info: Define Klaviyo Newsletter code (6 character code)

settings.label: Enables Klaviyo Abandoned Cart Flow to Track
settings.info: Script for Klaviyo is in snippet klaviyo-atc-flow.liquid

settings.label: Enable OneTrust Cookie Banner
settings.info: When enabled, cookie banner will appear upon site arrival for users without predefined settings. All banner styles and blocking config are within the OneTrust Portal.

settings.label: Enable Facebook Verification Tag
settings.info: When enabled, facebook verification tag will render.

settings.label: Enable Google Verification Tag
settings.info: When enabled, Google verification tag will render.

settings.label: Enable PDP FSN
settings.info: The PDP notice must be included as a block within the Product Information Section

settings.label: Threshold
settings.info: In pence/cents, with no decimal place

settings.label: Before Threshold Message
settings.info: Use *threshold* as a placeholder for the free shipping threshold value

settings.label: Include GSAP Core?
settings.info: If Including any other GSAP Files this box must be ticked

settings.label: Include GSAP Scroll Trigger?
settings.info: This script is required for DS-PArallax and DS-Side-Reveal

settings.label: Include cart countdown timer
settings.info: If date and time below are left blank timer will not show

settings.content: To enable in announcement bar, add countdown timer block in header

settings.label: Time of countdown end
settings.info: Add time as HH:MM if left blank or format not followed timer will not show

settings.label: SVG Icon
settings.info: remove width and height, add fill='currentColor' to match text

settings.label: Insert text to appear before timer
settings.info: If left blank no text outputs

settings.label: Insert text to appear after timer
settings.info: If left blank no text outputs

settings.label: Message to be displayed when counter reaches 0

settings.info: will only appear if countdown timer is deactivated

settings.label: SVG Icon
settings.info: remove width and height, add fill='currentColor' to match text
applies to cart message and cart countdown
